fields.description:
Steps To Reproduce:
1. Get the app.js from Android bug
2. Run the application 

Actual:
showPagingControl displays undefined for default

Expected:
showPagingControl should be false by default

Note:
Also occured in 1.8.0.1
fields.summary: iOS:  Ti.UI.ScrollableView showPagingControl sould be false by default
